messages.subject: Jeff Barry
messages.msgSnippet: Tanya said: Ok, how many of us have the over-powering urge to just slap this guy??? I know I do, or at least shake him up a bit? I m sure I do, but I wouldn t
messages.messageBody:
Tanya said:
Ok, how many of us have the over-powering urge to just slap this guy??? I
know
I do, or at least shake him up a bit?

I'm sure I do, but I wouldn't waste my time on him. Some people just won't
change their opinion or open their mind. *shrug* I don't think he's much of
a "threat" -- it's only one editorial with no evidence to support the
claims. ~Eryn

==
"I dreamed I was a butterfly, flitting around in the sky;
then I awoke. Now I wonder: Am I a man who dreamt of
being a butterfuly, or am I a butterfly dreaming that I am
a man?" - Chuang Tsu
http://www.camenaworks.com/Eryn/
#24591173 ::she just is::
AIM :: Opal Fayre
